Projects

  • Industry
    • CPDAX: Cryptocurrency Exchange, 2017 ~ 2018
    • Games: 2013 ~
  • Research
    • CPS-Sim, 2016 ~ 2017
      • End-to-end tool for developing CPSs (Cyber Physical System)
      • Demonstration: Tool
    • ECU-Level Real-Time Simulator, 2013 ~ 2017
      • w/ Hyundai Motors
      • Support verification of application logic on vehicle
      • Support ECU implementation by auto-code
item.dc:creator: Esji Kim
item.content:encoded:
Contents

  • Projects
  • Skills
  • Awards
  • Publications
  • Languages
  • Education

Projects

  • Industry
    • CPDAX: Cryptocurrency Exchange, 2017 ~ 2018
    • Games: 2013 ~
  • Research
    • CPS-Sim, 2016 ~ 2017
      • End-to-end tool for developing CPSs (Cyber Physical System)
      • Demonstration: Tool
    • ECU-Level Real-Time Simulator, 2013 ~ 2017
      • w/ Hyundai Motors
      • Support verification of application logic on vehicle
      • Support ECU implementation by auto-code generator from given logic
    • Component based Design Theory and Control Kernel for CPS, 2013 ~ 2015
      • Demonstration: Unity, Drone
    • Real-Time System SW on Multicore and GPGPU for Unmanned Vehicles, 2016 ~ 2017
    • Drone simulation delivering Automatic External Defibrillator (AED), 2017

Skills

  • Programming language
    • Go, Python, Javascript (Node, React, Meteor), Solidity
    • Assembly, C, C++, C#, Java, Objective-C
    • ML, MATLAB, HTML, PHP, JSP, SQL, Ocaml, Tcl/Tk
  • Platform
    • Ethereum, IPFS, Loom network
    • Spring, Django
    • Android, iOS, Tizen, Firebase
    • Cocos, Unity, UDK
    • Vehicle Simulator (CarSim, Torcs)
    • AUTOSAR, Odin, EB Tresos, Simulink, AutoBox
    • FlexRay, CAN(Controller Area Network), CAN-FD
    • AWS EC2, RDS, ALB, Lambda
    • GAE (Google App Engine)
    • RabbitMQ, Websocket, RPC, RTC
    • Jupyter, Anaconda, Docker
    • Tensorflow, Keras
    • OpenGL, OpenCV
    • MSSQL, MySQL, PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, LevelDB
    • ELK (Elastic search & Logstash & Kibana)
    • Eclipse plugin, Qt, MFC
    • NS2
    • Jekyll, Ghost
  • Tool
    • Github, SourceTree, Trello, JIRA, Confluence
    • Remix, Truffle
    • Doxygen
    • Dr.Memory, Valgrind
    • TASKING, GreenHills, CodeWarrior, Trace32
    • Infineon (TC1797, TC275), STMicro (SPC56EL70), Freescale (MPC5606B), RaspberryPi, Arduino
    • CANalyzer, CANDB
    • Vector (VN7600, VN1640), PCAN-USB
    • LaTex, Gnuplot, Nam
    • Photoshop and Illustrator

Awards

  • 2nd Prize, OSS Grand Developers Challenge, National IT Industry Promotion Agency (NIPA), 2016
  • Best Paper Award, Korea Computer Congress (KCC), 2017

Publications

  • Kyoung-Soo We, Seunggon Kim, Wonseok Lee, and Chang-Gun Lee, Functionally and Temporally Correct Simulation of Cyber-Systems for Automotive Systems, in IEEE Real-Time Systems Symposium (RTSS), Dec. 2017
  • Wonseok Lee, Kyoung-Soo We, Seunggon Kim, Sangyoun Paik, Jonathon Soulis, and and Chang-Gun Lee, An ECU-Close Design/Verification Tool for Automotive Systems, in IEEE Real-Time Systems Symposium (RTSS@Work), Paris, France, Dec. 2017
  • Hyejin Joo, Kyoung-Soo We, Seunggon Kim, and Chang-Gun Lee, An End-to-End Tool for Developing CPSs from Design to Implementation, in The First International Workshop on Verification and Validation of Cyber-Physical Systems (V2CPS), Reykjavik University, Iceland, June 2016

Languages

  • Korean
  • English
  • Japanese

Education

  • M.S. and Ph.D. Candidate, Computer Science, Seoul National University, Korea, 2017
  • B.S., Computer Science, Kwangwoon University, Korea, 2012
  • Extra
    • Self-Driving Car Nanodegree Term1 and Term2, Udacity, 2017
    • Software Maestro, Ministry of Science, Korea, 2013 ~ 2014
